A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cinematography was good\, action was fun\, plot had holes but the absolute trashing of one of the most iconic heroes of our cinema time to prematurely thrust the new characters to the forefront is unconscionable.  I can see why Mark Hamill did not like the direction for Luke. He ended up a getting a pixie filled Mickey Mouse boot in the rear. I am not averse to change and new\, but this was poorly handled. A real slap in George Lucas's face.
